name: Dreamlander
storyline:
Welcome to a world of dreams and nightmares!

Explore an open world filled with memorable characters, enemies you'll love to hate, secrets galore, and much more. Enjoy character back-stories, a deep world lore, and make choices to decide how your story will end. Meet several characters, and make friends or enemies across the land. Make tough decisions that may decide the fate of yourself and others. Choose to avoid conflict if you so desire.
summary: Welcome to a world of dreams and nightmares! Go on a unique retro-inspired adventure, explore a living world, and enjoy a rich OST in this highly experimental/psychedelic RPG.
